verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w flowing|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* (\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w faced|strong="H6440"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w*). \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w Next|strong="H6437"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w led|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w around|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w outer|strong="H2351"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w facing|strong="H6437"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w trickling|strong="H6379"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w south|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w measuring|strong="H6957"\w* \w line|strong="H6957"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand cubits \f + \fr 47:3 \ft 1,000 (long) cubits is approximately 1,750 feet or 533.4 meters.\f* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w led|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* ankle-deep \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H4058"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* off \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand cubits \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w led|strong="H5674"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* knee-deep \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w Again|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H4058"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand cubits \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w led|strong="H5674"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* waist-deep \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

Once \w again|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* off \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand cubits, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w risen|strong="H1342"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* deep enough \w for|strong="H3588"\w* swimming—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* foot.

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w do|strong="H8193"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w he|strong="H7725"\w* asked. \w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* arrived, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* number \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* along both \w banks|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3381"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w flows|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eastern|strong="H6930"\w* \w region|strong="H1552"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w goes|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Arabah|strong="H6160"\w*. \w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* empties \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*,\f + \fr 47:8 \ft That is, the Dead Sea\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* there becomes \w fresh|strong="H7495"\w*.\f + \fr 47:8 \ft Hebrew is healed; also in verses 9 and 11\f*

\w Wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w* flows, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w swarms|strong="H8317"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w number|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w fish|strong="H1710"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* flows \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w makes|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w fresh|strong="H7495"\w*; \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w* flows, \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* flourish.

\w Fishermen|strong="H1728"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shore; \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w En-eglaim|strong="H5882"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w spread|strong="H4894"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* catch \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w kinds|strong="H4327"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 47:10 \ft That is, the Mediterranean Sea; also in verses 15, 19, and 20\f*

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w swamps|strong="H1207"\w* \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w marshes|strong="H1207"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w become|strong="H7495"\w* \w fresh|strong="H7495"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*.

\w Along|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w banks|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w grow|strong="H5927"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wither|strong="H5034"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H8552"\w*. \w Each|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bear|strong="H3318"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w flows|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w used|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w healing|strong="H8644"\w*.” The Borders of the Land

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* boundaries \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w as|strong="H5157"\w* \w an|strong="H5157"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w receive|strong="H5157"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w portions|strong="H2256"\w*.\f + \fr 47:13 \ft Since Levi had no portion, Joseph’s sons Ephraim and Manasseh received land as two tribes.\f*

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w divide|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* equally \w among|strong="H5159"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w swore|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* uplifted \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* forefathers, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5159"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w boundary|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*: On the north side it will extend from the Great Sea by way of Hethlon through Lebo-hamath to Zedad,

Berothah, and Sibraim \f + \fr 47:16 \ft LXX; MT 15...through Lebo to Zedad, 16 Hamath, Berothah, and Sibraim\f* (which is on the border between Damascus and Hamath), as far as Hazer-hatticon, which is on the border of Hauran.
So the border will run from the Sea to Hazar-enan, along the northern border of Damascus, with the territory of Hamath to the north. This will be the northern boundary.

On the east side the border will run between Hauran and Damascus, along the Jordan between Gilead and the land of Israel, to the Eastern Sea and as far as Tamar.\f + \fr 47:18 \ft See Syriac; that is, of Israel, to the Dead Sea and as far as Tamar; Hebrew of Israel. And along the Eastern Sea you are to measure.\f* This will be the eastern boundary.

On the south side it will run from Tamar to the waters of Meribath-kadesh, and along the Brook of Egypt \f + \fr 47:19 \ft Hebrew does not include of Egypt.\f* to the Great Sea. This will be the southern boundary.
And on the west side, the Great Sea will be the boundary up to a point opposite Lebo-hamath. This will be the western boundary.

\w You|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w among|strong="H3478"\w* yourselves according \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H2505"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w You|strong="H8432"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w allot|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1616"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1616"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w You|strong="H8432"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w treat|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* native-born \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*; \w along|strong="H8432"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w*, \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w allotted|strong="H5307"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5414"\w* whatever \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* \w dwells|strong="H1481"\w*, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w assign|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.
